org.openimaj.vis

Class VideoVisualisation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.video.Video<I>
      • org.openimaj.video.AnimatedVideo<MBFImage>
        • org.openimaj.vis.VideoVisualisation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, Iterable<MBFImage>

    public class VideoVisualisation
extends AnimatedVideo<MBFImage>
    This class provides a means for generating a video representation of a visualisationImpl. This has various advantages in that the visualisationImpl can be rendered easily to a video file or the VideoDisplay tools can be used to display the visualisationImpl.
    Author:
    David Dupplaw (dpd@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      VideoVisualisation(Visualisation<?> v)
      Construct a video visualisationImpl using the given visualisationImpl.
